sentences.en: ' Entreat me to believe it no more, Miss Manette.
sentences.cn: “别再请求我相信了, 曼内特小姐.

sentences.en: 'I entreat you to tell me more, sir.'
sentences.cn: “ 我求你告诉我更多一些情况, 先生. ”

sentences.en: " Be careful of my friend , I entreat you, and leave me. "
sentences.cn: “ 求你小心照顾我的朋友, 去吧. ”

sentences.en: " Come thou, and entreat his blessing!
sentences.cn: “ 你过来, 恳求他的祝福吧!

sentences.en: Charles Darnay felt it hopeless to entreat him further , and his pride was touched besides.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯-达尔内感到再恳求他己是枉然, 自尊心也受到了伤害.

sentences.en: He beseeched me to entreat your Majesties to hear and see the matter.
sentences.cn: 他拜托我一定请陛下二位也来看戏.

sentences.en: He entreated them to delay their departure.
His friends entreated him not to go.
sentences.cn: 他的朋友们恳求他不要去。

sentences.en: However much you may entreat him, you will get little or nothing.
sentences.cn: 无论你向他恳求多少, 你都不会得到什么东西的.

sentences.en: I earnestly entreat that we don't get caught out again.
sentences.cn: 我诚挚地祈求我们不要再被人抓住短处了。

sentences.en: I entreat this favor of you.
I entreat you to show mercy.
May I entreat a favour of you ?
Please help me, I entreat you.
She shouldn't entreat her elder like that.
So kind as they are to you! Take the part with a good grace, I entreat.
sentences.cn: 他们待你那么好. 我求你,顺顺当当地承担起那个角色吧.

sentences.en: They entreat me to acquaint her with it.
sentences.cn: 他们一定要我把这件事告诉她.

trans.tran_en: to ask someone, in a very emotional way, to do something for you
